Detailed Description

An abstract class for information chunks that are given to Examiner objects by TraveRsal objects.

Member Function Documentation

virtual const Sequence& Explorer::TraversalCallback::getSequence (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a sequence of moves that leads from the traversal beginning state to the current one.

Note:
This operation can be time consuming, depending on the travelsal technique. Use it sparingly.
Returns:
a Sequence object.
